headline: Jim Cramer on TAT Technologies (TATT): “I Think That That Is Exactly Where To Be”
summary: TAT Technologies Ltd. (NASDAQ:TATT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer looked at recently. Noting the presence of an “aging global fleet of aircraft and the backlog of Boeing,” a caller mentioned that the company is benefiting from it. Cramer commented: Yeah, that is a really interesting stock. I know it’s moved up a lot, […]

headline: VergeIO Records Strong Growth as Private Cloud Operating System Strategy Accelerates
summary: ANN ARBOR, Mich., February 10, 2026--VergeIO, the VMware alternative redefining infrastructure as a Private Cloud Operating System, recorded its strongest year to date with annual recurring revenue growing more than 80% year over year. The company exceeded its 2025 ARR plan by more than 25%, driven by increased enterprise adoption of VergeOS and a growing shift away from traditional virtualization toward cloud-style operations on customer-controlled infrastructure.

headline: Non-Destructive Testing Equipment Market to Reach US$ 5,639.70 Million by 2033 Driven by Infrastructure Safety Mandates and Predictive Maintenance Adoption | Astute Analytica

headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From TransDigm’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: TransDigm’s Q4 results prompted a significant negative reaction from the market, even as the company’s revenue and non-GAAP earnings per share came in above Wall Street expectations. Management attributed the revenue growth to strong performance in the commercial OEM and aftermarket segments, supported by rising Boeing and Airbus production rates and healthier air traffic trends. headline: Boeing Wins C-17 Upgrade Deal And 737 MAX Order As Valuation Lags
summary: Boeing secured a contract to modernize the U.S. Air Force C-17 Globemaster III fleet, selecting Curtiss-Wright to supply mission computer technology. The company announced Air Cambodia's first order for up to 20 737 MAX aircraft, expanding its presence in Southeast Asia. Both announcements arrive as Boeing shares trade around $244.71 under ticker NYSE:BA. Boeing, trading on the NYSE under ticker NYSE:BA, is drawing attention with fresh activity in both its defense and commercial businesses...
